item.title: Report X-2024091566
item.description:
Report X-2024091566

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-26T09:22:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-20
  • City: Dulles
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On Sept 19th a package was found during the PM sort that was leaking. The package contained twelve one quart cans of UN1263 Paint, 3, PGIII. One of the cans had the lid come loose and the lock ring did not keep it sealed allowing the liquid to leak out of the can. The package was placed into a steel salvage drum and is pending disposition.
